law.text: There is hereby created and established in Miami-Dade County an advisory board to be known as the Miami-Dade County Olympic Exploratory Committee.

The members of the Miami-Dade Sports Commission shall serve as the members of the Miami-Dade County Olympic Exploratory Committee. Eligibility for membership on the Miami-Dade County Olympic Exploratory Committee shall be the same as membership for the Miami-Dade Sports Commission, as codified in Section 2-1603 of the Code of Miami-Dade County.

The Miami-Dade County Olympic Exploratory Committee shall:
Seek input and support from the public and private sectors during the evaluation of the feasibility of submitting a bid for and potentially hosting the Olympic Games or the Pan American Games or any other comparable international athletic events; and
Submit an annual report to the Board of County Commissioners as to its findings.
The Mayor or his designee shall provide staff support to the Miami-Dade County Olympic Exploratory Committee.
